issue.message: The current server URL is a relative path '/v1.33' and needs to be updated to a full URL with configurable variables for the Docker instance domain and API version.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the first server's URL from '/v1.33' to 'https://{your-docker-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}'. Added variable definitions for 'your-docker-instance-domain' with a default of 'docker.example.com' and 'api-version-number' with a default of '1.33' (matching the spec's info.version).
